original_text: Zion's people then say to the Lord, ‘Please punish the people of Babylonia, because they did cruel things to us.’ Jerusalem's people say, ‘Pay back the people of Babylonia, because they killed our relatives.’ Zion's people then say to the Lord, ‘Please punish the people of Babylonia, because they did cruel things to us.’ Jerusalem's people say, ‘Pay back the people of Babylonia, because they killed our relatives.’ Zion's people then say to the Lord, ‘Please punish the people of Babylonia, because they did cruel things to us.’ Jerusalem's people say, ‘Pay back the people of Babylonia, because they killed our relatives.’ Zion's people then say to the Lord,
korean_text: 내가 받은 폭행과 내 육체에 대한 학대가 바벨론에 돌아가기를 원한다고 시온 주민이 말할 것이요 내 피 흘린 죄가 갈대아 주민에게로 돌아가기를 원한다고 예루살렘이 말하리라

sentences.original_text: Zion's people then say to the Lord
Please punish the people of Babylonia
because they did cruel things to us
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 우리에게 잔인한 일을 했기 때문입니다
